mainText:
Dear Steve Jobs,

You not only inspired me, but became that ONE person whom I'd love to 
be. I have never felt the way I do right now, and although I have never 
met, heard, spoke, or saw a glimpse of you in real life, you are a man I 
will honour. I man that redefined the world of creativity, made a place 
in the hearts of many without even trying.
author: Princess
